crochetghoulie tumblr com nostromo 2 i suggest using at least two colors for this blanket to see the pattern the second color will surround the first color you ll see what i mean part 1 the starting pieces these pieces allow you to start the blanket pattern a flat bottom edge is made for the easy addition of a border later on *for each starting piece you need to make bobble circles in colors 1 2 and 3 see round 1 below how many of each depends on how many pieces you make how wide you want the blanket to be round 1 starting with color 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 double_crochet into ring ch1 this is your first bobble + ch1 for the remaining 7 bobbles yo insert hook into ring and pull up a loop pull through 2 loops on hook yo go back into the ring with your hook and pull up a loop pull through 2 loops then pull through remaining 3 loops ch1 you should have 8 bobbles + 8 ch1 in your circle in total pull loop closed join with slip_stitch to first bobble and fasten_off round 2 this round is basically a granny square round connect color 2 into any ch1 space ch3 acts as first double_crochet 2dc in same ch1 space in next ch1 space 2dc ch2 2dc this is a corner 3dc in next ch1 space 2dc + ch2 + 2dc in next ch1 space 3 times slip_stitch in top of ch3 to join fasten_off crochetghoulie tumblr com nostromo 3 round 3 turn your work so that the wrong side is facing you attach color 3
